attributes.action: re-nationalize the London transport network and national rail network
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the prime minister to re-nationalize the London transport network along with the national rail system, out of private hands and run by and for the people of the UK and not based on profit returns.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
